availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Ashcraft (Sargeant in Estill County, Kentucky)

body.p: Soldier in Estill County. Son of Amos and Rebecca Ashcraft. Married to Mary Kelly Ashcroft in Estill County in 1872. Sergeant in Union Army as part of 8th Kentucky Regiment (U.S.A) from January 15th, 1862 until discharged on October 15th, 1862. Died in 1896 in Estill County.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 72.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 770-71.
_Kentucky Marriage Records, Estill County Courthouse, Irvine, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, p 48.
